articles.title: Judge Andrew Napolitano: My office pool questions (and answers) for 2020
articles.content:
1. In 2020, President Trump will...
a. start a war with Iran.
b. refuse to enforce ObamaCare.
c. retain the core of ObamaCare because he will have a change of heart.

articles.author: Samuel Chamberlain
articles.title: Former Yankees pitcher Don Larsen, who threw only World Series perfect game, dead at age 90
articles.description: Don Larsen, a journeyman pitcher best remembered for throwing the only perfect game in World Series history as a member of the New York Yankees, has died, a spokesman announced late Wednesday. He was 90 years old.
articles.content:
